query:
ALTER TABLE `raw_emails` ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `gmailMessageId` varchar(128);
ALTER TABLE `raw_emails` ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `gmailThreadId` varchar(128);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `newsletter_sources` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `name` varchar(256) NOT NULL,
  `emailAddress` varchar(320) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  `isActive` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  `lastIngestedAt` timestamp NULL,
  `totalIngested` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ingest_log` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `runAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `status` enum('success','partial','error') NOT NULL,
  `emailsFound` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `emailsNew` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `emailsSkipped` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `errorMessage` text,
  `durationMs` int
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `newsletter_sources` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `name` varchar(256) NOT NULL,
  `emailAddress` varchar(320) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  `isActive` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  `lastIngestedAt` timestamp NULL,
  `totalIngested` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ingest_log` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `runAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `status` enum('success','partial','error') NOT NULL,
  `emailsFound` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `emailsNew` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `emailsSkipped` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `errorMessage` text,
  `durationMs` int
);
